title.rendered: THE TEN SPOT west shore, vancouver island

content.rendered:
beauty bar in west shore, vancouver island | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in west shore, vancouver island. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up
beauty bar in west shore, vancouver island | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 101 – 2830 peatt road
  • 250-361-1100
  • westshore@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon.: closed

tue. : 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

wed. : 10:00 am – 7:00 pm

thurs. : 10:00 am – 7:00 pm

fri. : 10:00 am – 5:00 pm

sat.: 10:00 am – 5:00 pm

sun.: 10:00 am – 5:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

I had a gel overlay manicure with Katie. She was so kind and did a great job, the salon is bright and clean I’ll definitely be back!
Adele Wright
1721765645
Had a wax and pedi. Alex is amazing. I really can’t say enough. The wax was pain free. I have never experienced no pain. And my toes are so cute. Excellent service. Have nothing negative to report. The place is super clean and very comfortable.... Highly recommend 10 spot.read more
Suri Design
1721170668
Great space with flexible seating. Super clean and very peaceful when I was there. It is not luxurious but more fun and efficient, with music and television to entertain. Katie did my pedi. She was gentle, careful, and explained every step. She went... out of her way to make me feel welcome and cared for. I will be returning for sure!read more
Kate McCabe
1713059499
This was my first visit to Ten Spot. It's super clean, staff are very friendly and knowledgeable. I had four waxing services done in my visit, Alex was quick and efficient and the price was very reasonable. Have booked my next appointment- would... highly recommend.read more
Sue Maxwell
1705510593
This is a lovely place with a great atmosphere! The staff are friendly and provide amazing, professional services with top notch results. It’s organized and very clean. I’ve never felt so safe in a salon🧡
Alexandra Oh boy
1682099555
Wonderful nail salon. Having been to downtown Victoria branch and downtown Toronto branch I believe this branch has expedite potential. Here the shop is bright, clean, and obstruction free. Staff are fabulous with provide help picking out nail... polish colors and don’t mind listing to me being chatty. Tea and water are available. I also highlight Katie’s top notch, tentative nail polish work.read more
Hannah St
1674283314
‹
›
